name: Philosophy Discussion on Death & Meaning of Life
description: Join us for a thought-provoking small group discussion on Death & Meaning of Life! This will be the first in a series of discussions exploring some fundamental questions about what it means to be alive. We'll start by exploring why we fear death, what death means to us, and the nature of immortality. No philosophy background is needed; anyone who is curious about these questions is welcome to join. Please note that sign-ups are limited to 10 people on a first-come-first-serve basis.
